# Notes About MR
Add a quick summary of your changes here.

# Notes for reviewer
Add notes for reviewer or instructions if you have any.

## Screenshots (if applicable)
If the changes affect the UI, include screenshots or GIFs to demonstrate the visual differences before and after the changes.

## Checklist
  - [ ] My changes do not break any existing functionality or other components.
  - [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.

** General Style **
  - [ ] My contribution is simple, flexible, and readable.

** CSS **
  - [ ] My Component uses CSS
  - [ ] For colors, font faces and border-radiuses, I have used existing css variables, or created a new one.
  - [ ] My variable names are short, and context-aware.
  - [ ] My contribution does not use inline styles.
